text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActMood where concept is-a _ActMoodPredicate

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActMood
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _ActMoodPredicateActMoodPredicate**Definition:** An act that expresses condition statements for other acts.

name: ActMoodPredicate
title: ActMoodPredicate
description: Any of the above service moods (e.g., event, intent, or goal) can be turned into a predicate used as a criterion to express conditionals (or queries.) However, currently we allow only criteria on service events.
